title.narrative: Capacity building of employees and volunteers, Mwanza (ELVD/ELCT)

description.narrative:
The goal of the project is to educate new religious leaders and capacity building of volunteers in order to improve the educational system in Tanzanian communities.
Establishing an education platform for the exchange of curricula, mutual reflection and evaluation.
Capacity building for teachers and education environment in four different education institutions.
Enable possibility for dialogue regarding rights of marginalized groups.

The grant is given to the organisation due to their application to the COVID-19 Emergency Pool (Nødpulje) in order for the organisation to continue their skills development activities in India. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, planned development activities are in risk of closure, which would negatively affect results.
The goal of the project is to educate new religious leaders and capacity building of volunteers in order to improve the educational system in Tanzanian communities.
